ITEM.TEXT: Number of object processed by Status
Estimated Memory size of the bloc
ABAP Type Kind allowed for weight Field
Status information to send to parent

LOCAL.TYPES: ` *"* use this source file for any type declarations (class *"* definitions, interfaces or data types) you need for method *"* implementation or private method's signature
LOCAL.IMPLEMENTATIONS: ` *"* local class implementation for public class *"* use this source file for the implementation part of *"* local helper classes
LOCAL.MACROS: ` *"* use this source file for any macro definitions you need *"* in the implementation part of the class

ITEM.TEXT: Taille d'un bloc (unité mini de traitement)

ITEM.SOURCE:
` ********************************************************************** * Author : Al'oustad Taryck BENSIALI (taryck.bensiali@gmail.com) * * Date : 2008 December * ********************************************************************** DATA _bloc TYPE ygpl_objects.
_bloc-bloc_id = generate_bloc_id( ). _bloc-run_id = o_run->process_id. _bloc-status = ygpl_mt_status=>to_do. DESCRIBE TABLE objects LINES _bloc-nb. IF bloc_size <= 0. _bloc-bloc_size = _bloc-nb. ELSE. _bloc-bloc_size = bloc_size. ENDIF. _bloc-mem_size = get_size( objects ). _bloc-obj_data = encode_data( objects ). IF sy-subrc = 0. GET TIME STAMP FIELD _bloc-timestamp. INSERT ygpl_objects FROM _bloc. ADD 1 TO total_blocs_count. ENDIF. ASSERT sy-subrc <> 0. * IF sy-subrc <> 0. * RAISE failed. * ENDIF.

ITEM.TEXT: Taille (en nb d'objet) d'un bloc (unité mini de traitement)

ITEM.SOURCE:
` ********************************************************************** * Author : Al'oustad Taryck BENSIALI (taryck.bensiali@gmail.com) * * Date : 2008 December * ********************************************************************** DATA _bs TYPE td_bloc_size. DATA _count TYPE i.
* Check Objects DESCRIBE TABLE objects LINES _count. CHECK _count >= 1.
ADD _count TO total_objects.
* Check Bloc_Size IF bloc_size < 1. _bs = 1. ELSE. _bs = bloc_size. ENDIF.
CALL METHOD create_blocs EXPORTING OBJECTS = OBJECTS bloc_size = _bs weight_fn = weight_fn dependencies = dependencies.

ITEM.TEXT: Table dépendance bloc : OBJ->Bloc ou Bloc->Obj
Taille (en nb d'objet) d'un bloc (unité mini de traitement)

ITEM.SOURCE:
` ********************************************************************** * Author : Al'oustad Taryck BENSIALI (taryck.bensiali@gmail.com) * * Date : 2008 December * ********************************************************************** FIELD-SYMBOLS: <bloc> LIKE LINE OF m_bloc. DATA _obj LIKE LINE OF <bloc>-objs.
READ TABLE m_bloc WITH TABLE KEY id = bloc ASSIGNING <bloc>. IF sy-subrc <> 0. * RAISE failed. ENDIF.
ADD size TO <bloc>-size. _obj-id = obj. APPEND _obj TO <bloc>-objs. IF sy-subrc <> 0. * RAISE failed. ENDIF.
CALL METHOD set_relation_object_bloc EXPORTING obj = obj bloc = bloc changing obj2blocs = obj2blocs. * EXCEPTIONS * failed = 1 * others = 2. IF sy-subrc <> 0. * RAISE failed. ENDIF.

` ********************************************************************** * Author : Al'oustad Taryck BENSIALI (taryck.bensiali@gmail.com) * * Date : 2008 December * ********************************************************************** DATA: abap_type TYPE REF TO cl_abap_typedescr. DATA: abap_structure TYPE REF TO cl_abap_structdescr. DATA line_ref TYPE REF TO data.
FIELD-SYMBOLS : <field> LIKE LINE OF cl_abap_structdescr=>components, <wa> TYPE ANY.
abap_type = cl_abap_typedescr=>describe_by_data( objects ).
ASSERT abap_type->kind = cl_abap_typedescr=>kind_table. * if abap_type->kind <> cl_abap_typedescr=>kind_table. ** RAISE failed. * ENDIF.
CREATE DATA line_ref LIKE LINE OF objects. ASSIGN line_ref->* TO <wa>.
abap_type = cl_abap_typedescr=>describe_by_data( <wa> ). ASSERT abap_type->kind = cl_abap_typedescr=>kind_struct. * IF abap_type->kind <> cl_abap_typedescr=>kind_struct. * RAISE failed. * ENDIF.
abap_structure ?= abap_type.
READ TABLE abap_structure->components ASSIGNING <field> WITH KEY name = weight_fn. IF sy-subrc <> 0. * RAISE failed. ELSEIF NOT <field>-type_kind IN r_weight_type_kind. * RAISE failed. ENDIF.

` DATA tk LIKE LINE OF r_weight_type_kind.
ASSERT batch_rate > 0 AND batch_rate < 1. * Génerate Weight Typekind tk-sign = 'I'. tk-option = 'EQ'. tk-low = cl_abap_typedescr=>typekind_num. APPEND tk TO r_weight_type_kind. tk-low = cl_abap_typedescr=>typekind_packed. APPEND tk TO r_weight_type_kind. tk-low = cl_abap_typedescr=>typekind_float. APPEND tk TO r_weight_type_kind. tk-low = cl_abap_typedescr=>typekind_int. APPEND tk TO r_weight_type_kind. tk-low = cl_abap_typedescr=>typekind_int1. APPEND tk TO r_weight_type_kind. tk-low = cl_abap_typedescr=>typekind_int2. APPEND tk TO r_weight_type_kind. tk-low = cl_abap_typedescr=>typekind_numeric. APPEND tk TO r_weight_type_kind.

ITEM.TEXT: Confirm processing of a batch (n blocs)

ITEM.SOURCE:
` DATA _correction TYPE i. FIELD-SYMBOLS : <wa_b> LIKE LINE OF current_blocs.
ASSERT current_blocs IS NOT INITIAL.
IF NOT status_to_send IS INITIAL. SEND_OBJECT_CONFIRMATION( ). ENDIF.
IF processed_objects <> confirmed_objects. * External error all objects processed haven't get a status or too much _correction = processed_objects - confirmed_objects. " aurait du etre envoyé - réellement envoyé confirm_objects( status = ygpl_mt_status=>inconsistency count = _correction ). SEND_OBJECT_CONFIRMATION( ). ENDIF.
LOOP AT current_blocs ASSIGNING <wa_b>. UPDATE ygpl_objects SET status = ygpl_mt_status=>done WHERE bloc_id = <wa_b>-bloc_id. ASSERT sy-subrc = 0. ENDLOOP. CLEAR current_blocs.

ITEM.TEXT: Confirm each single object or set of objects

ITEM.SOURCE:
` DATA statut LIKE LINE OF global_status.
statut-status = status. statut-count = count.
ADD count TO confirmed_objects.
COLLECT statut INTO global_status. COLLECT statut INTO status_to_send.

` me->o_run = o_run. ASSERT me->o_run IS BOUND. IF o_messaging IS BOUND. me->o_messaging = o_messaging. me->o_categories = o_messaging->o_categories. ELSE. IF o_categories IS BOUND. me->o_categories = o_categories. ELSE. CREATE OBJECT me->o_categories. ENDIF. CREATE OBJECT me->o_messaging EXPORTING process_id = o_run->process_id o_categories = me->o_categories. ENDIF. set_maximum_memory( maximum_memory ).

ITEM.TEXT: Taille (en nb d'objet) d'un bloc (unité mini de traitement)

ITEM.SOURCE:
` ********************************************************************** * Author : Al'oustad Taryck BENSIALI (taryck.bensiali@gmail.com) * * Date : 2008 December * ********************************************************************** DATA _wfn TYPE td_fn. DATA tab_ref TYPE REF TO data. DATA _from TYPE i. DATA _to TYPE i.
FIELD-SYMBOLS : <fs> LIKE objects.
IF NOT weight_fn IS INITIAL. CALL METHOD check_weight_fn EXPORTING OBJECTS = OBJECTS weight_fn = weight_fn. _wfn = weight_fn. ENDIF.
IF _wfn IS INITIAL AND dependencies IS INITIAL. * Quick Bloc Generation CREATE DATA tab_ref LIKE objects. ASSIGN tab_ref->* TO <fs>. _from = 1. DO. _to = _from + bloc_size - 1. IF _to > total_objects. _to = total_objects. ENDIF. APPEND LINES OF objects FROM _from TO _to TO <fs>. CALL METHOD add_bloc EXPORTING OBJECTS = <fs>. IF _to >= total_objects. EXIT. ELSE. _from = _to + 1. ENDIF. CLEAR <fs>. ENDDO. ELSE. CALL METHOD create_complex_blocs EXPORTING OBJECTS = OBJECTS bloc_size = bloc_size weight_fn = weight_fn dependencies = dependencies. ENDIF.
o_run->set_bloc_count( total_blocs_count ).

ITEM.TEXT: Create blocs complexes (avec dépendant et/ou par poids)
Taille (en nb d'objet) d'un bloc (unité mini de traitement)

ITEM.SOURCE:
` ********************************************************************** * Author : Al'oustad Taryck BENSIALI (taryck.bensiali@gmail.com) * * Date : 2008 December * ********************************************************************** DATA it_objlst TYPE tt_lines_nfo. DATA tab_ref TYPE REF TO data. DATA fn TYPE string. DATA weight TYPE td_bloc_size. DATA b_weight TYPE td_bloc_size. DATA line_ref TYPE REF TO data.
FIELD-SYMBOLS : <obj> TYPE ANY, <weight> TYPE ANY, <objects> LIKE objects, <wa> TYPE ANY.
IF NOT dependencies IS INITIAL. CALL METHOD create_with_dependencies EXPORTING OBJECTS = OBJECTS bloc_size = bloc_size weight_fn = weight_fn dependencies = dependencies IMPORTING done_obj = it_objlst. ENDIF.
CREATE DATA line_ref LIKE LINE OF objects. ASSIGN line_ref->* TO <wa>.
CREATE DATA tab_ref LIKE objects. ASSIGN tab_ref->* TO <objects>.
IF NOT weight_fn IS INITIAL. CONCATENATE '<obj>-' weight_fn INTO fn. ENDIF. LOOP AT objects ASSIGNING <obj>. * check obj allready done READ TABLE it_objlst WITH TABLE KEY key = sy-tabix TRANSPORTING NO FIELDS. IF sy-subrc = 0. CONTINUE. ENDIF. * Weight determine weight = 1. IF NOT fn IS INITIAL. ASSIGN (fn) TO <weight>. IF sy-subrc = 0. weight = <weight>. ENDIF. ENDIF. * Add bloc ADD weight TO b_weight. IF b_weight >= bloc_size. SUBTRACT weight FROM b_weight. CALL METHOD add_bloc EXPORTING OBJECTS = <objects> bloc_size = b_weight. b_weight = weight. FREE: <objects>. ENDIF. * DO the line <wa> = <obj>. APPEND <wa> TO <objects>. ENDLOOP.
* Add last bloc IF NOT <objects> IS INITIAL. CALL METHOD add_bloc EXPORTING OBJECTS = <objects> bloc_size = b_weight. FREE <objects>. ENDIF.

ITEM.TEXT: Table dépendance bloc : OBJ->Bloc ou Bloc->Obj
Taille (en nb d'objet) d'un bloc (unité mini de traitement)

ITEM.SOURCE:
` ********************************************************************** * Author : Al'oustad Taryck BENSIALI (taryck.bensiali@gmail.com) * * Date : 2008 December * ********************************************************************** STATICS next_id TYPE td_num_key. DATA _wa LIKE LINE OF m_bloc. DATA _obj LIKE LINE OF _wa-objs.
ADD 1 TO next_id. _wa-id = next_id. IF size < 1. _wa-size = 1. ELSE. _wa-size = size. ENDIF. _obj-id = obj. APPEND _obj TO _wa-objs. INSERT _wa INTO TABLE m_bloc. IF sy-subrc <> 0. * RAISE failed. ENDIF.
bloc = _wa-id.
CALL METHOD set_relation_object_bloc EXPORTING obj = obj bloc = bloc CHANGING obj2blocs = obj2blocs. * EXCEPTIONS * failed = 1 * OTHERS = 2. * IF sy-subrc <> 0. * RAISE failed. * ENDIF.

ITEM.TEXT: Taille (en nb d'objet) d'un bloc (unité mini de traitement)

ITEM.SOURCE:
` ********************************************************************** * Author : Al'oustad Taryck BENSIALI (taryck.bensiali@gmail.com) * * Date : 2008 December * ********************************************************************** DATA: it_obj2blocs TYPE tt_lines_nfo, " Index = Obj, ID = Bloc it_mini_blocs TYPE tt_blocs_nfo, obj_size TYPE td_bloc_size, obj1_bloc TYPE td_num_key, obj2_bloc TYPE td_num_key, _dependencies TYPE tt_dependencies, obj_count TYPE i.
FIELD-SYMBOLS : <dep> LIKE LINE OF dependencies.
DESCRIBE TABLE objects LINES obj_count. _dependencies = dependencies. DELETE _dependencies WHERE obj1 < 1 OR obj1 > obj_count OR obj2 < 1 OR obj2 > obj_count. * Create µblocs LOOP AT _dependencies ASSIGNING <dep>. IF <dep>-obj1 = <dep>-obj2. CONTINUE. ENDIF. AT NEW obj1. * check if obj1 afected to obj1_bloc = get_object_bloc( num = <dep>-obj1 table = it_obj2blocs ). ENDAT. * check if obj1 afected to obj2_bloc = get_object_bloc( num = <dep>-obj2 table = it_obj2blocs ). IF obj1_bloc IS INITIAL AND obj2_bloc IS INITIAL. * Creat new µbloc obj_size = get_object_size( objects = objects weight_fn = weight_fn obj_num = <dep>-obj1 ). CALL METHOD create_micro_bloc EXPORTING obj = <dep>-obj1 size = obj_size IMPORTING bloc = obj1_bloc CHANGING m_bloc = it_mini_blocs obj2blocs = it_obj2blocs. * EXCEPTIONS * failed = 1 * OTHERS = 2. * IF sy-subrc <> 0. * RAISE failed. * ENDIF. ENDIF. IF obj2_bloc IS INITIAL. * Affect µbloc obj1 to obj2 obj_size = get_object_size( objects = objects weight_fn = weight_fn obj_num = <dep>-obj2 ). CALL METHOD add_objects_2_micro_bloc EXPORTING obj = <dep>-obj2 size = obj_size bloc = obj1_bloc CHANGING m_bloc = it_mini_blocs obj2blocs = it_obj2blocs. * EXCEPTIONS * failed = 1 * OTHERS = 2. * IF sy-subrc <> 0. * RAISE failed. * ENDIF. ELSE. * Join µbloc obj1 & Obj2 CALL METHOD join_2_micro_blocs EXPORTING bloc1 = obj1_bloc bloc2 = obj2_bloc CHANGING m_bloc = it_mini_blocs obj2blocs = it_obj2blocs. * EXCEPTIONS * failed = 1 * OTHERS = 2. * IF sy-subrc <> 0. * RAISE failed. * ENDIF. ENDIF. ENDLOOP.
FREE it_obj2blocs. * Groups µbloc to get wanted size CALL METHOD generate_blocs EXPORTING bloc_size = bloc_size CHANGING m_bloc = it_mini_blocs. * EXCEPTIONS * failed = 1 * OTHERS = 2. * IF sy-subrc <> 0. * RAISE failed. * ENDIF.
CALL METHOD send_blocs EXPORTING OBJECTS = OBJECTS blocs = it_mini_blocs weight_fn = weight_fn IMPORTING done_obj = done_obj. * EXCEPTIONS * failed = 1 * OTHERS = 2. * IF sy-subrc <> 0. * RAISE failed. * ENDIF.
` IMPORT objects = any FROM DATA BUFFER buffer.
` EXPORT objects = any TO DATA BUFFER result COMPRESSION ON.

ITEM.TEXT: Taille (en nb d'objet) d'un bloc (unité mini de traitement)

ITEM.SOURCE:
` ********************************************************************** * Author : Al'oustad Taryck BENSIALI (taryck.bensiali@gmail.com) * * Date : 2008 December * ********************************************************************** TYPES: t_line LIKE LINE OF m_bloc. DATA: size TYPE td_bloc_size, new_b TYPE t_line, blocs TYPE STANDARD TABLE OF t_line. FIELD-SYMBOLS: <b> TYPE t_line.
blocs = m_bloc. REFRESH m_bloc. SORT blocs BY size DESCENDING. DO. IF blocs IS INITIAL. EXIT. ENDIF. READ TABLE blocs INDEX 1 ASSIGNING <b>. new_b = <b>. DELETE blocs INDEX 1. IF sy-subrc <> 0. * RAISE failed. ENDIF. IF new_b-size < bloc_size AND NOT blocs IS INITIAL. size = bloc_size - new_b-size. LOOP AT blocs ASSIGNING <b>. IF <b>-size < size. ADD <b>-size TO new_b-size. size = bloc_size - new_b-size. APPEND LINES OF <b>-objs TO new_b-objs. IF sy-subrc <> 0. * RAISE failed. ENDIF. DELETE blocs. IF sy-subrc <> 0. * RAISE failed. ENDIF. ENDIF. ENDLOOP. ENDIF. INSERT new_b INTO TABLE m_bloc. IF sy-subrc <> 0. * RAISE failed. ENDIF. ENDDO.

` ********************************************************************** * Author : Al'oustad Taryck BENSIALI (taryck.bensiali@gmail.com) * * Date : 2008 December * ********************************************************************** DATA tab_ref TYPE REF TO data. DATA maxrow TYPE i. DATA rows TYPE i. DATA mem_size TYPE td_memory_size. DATA t_size TYPE td_memory_size. DATA _run TYPE ts_run. DATA _blocs TYPE STANDARD TABLE OF ygplmt_objects.
FIELD-SYMBOLS: <fs> LIKE objects, <wa> LIKE LINE OF _blocs.
ASSERT current_blocs[] IS INITIAL.
CREATE DATA tab_ref LIKE objects. ASSIGN tab_ref->* TO <fs>.
* CALL METHOD ygpl_mt_locks=>lock * EXPORTING * run_id = o_run->process_id * cat = ygpl_mt_categori=>data_bloc. * CALL METHOD _lock * EXPORTING * run_id = run_id * cat = ygpl_mt_categori=>data_bloc * EXCEPTIONS * foreign_lock = 1 * sys_failure = 2 * OTHERS = 3. * IF sy-subrc = 1. * RAISE foreign_lock. * ELSEIF sy-subrc <> 0. * RAISE failed. * ENDIF.
* Determine Maxrow o_run->refresh( ).
* CALL METHOD _get_run * IMPORTING * run_data = _run * EXCEPTIONS * not_found = 1 * OTHERS = 2. * IF sy-subrc <> 0. * CALL METHOD _unlock( run_id = run_id * cat = ygpl_mt_categori=>data_bloc ). * RAISE failed. * ENDIF.
maxrow = ( o_run->infos-obj_left / o_run->infos-objects * o_run->infos-blocs * batch_rate ) DIV o_run->infos-threads + 1. IF maxrow < 1. maxrow = 1. ENDIF.
* Get data : Big ones first SELECT * INTO TABLE _blocs FROM ygplmt_objects UP TO maxrow ROWS WHERE run_id = o_run->process_id AND status = ygpl_mt_status=>to_do AND bloc_size > bloc_size.
IF NOT bloc_size IS INITIAL. * When no more big ones DESCRIBE TABLE _blocs LINES rows. SUBTRACT rows FROM maxrow. IF maxrow > 0. SELECT * APPENDING TABLE _blocs FROM ygplmt_objects UP TO maxrow ROWS WHERE run_id = o_run->process_id AND status = ygpl_mt_status=>to_do AND bloc_size <= bloc_size. CLEAR bloc_size. ENDIF. ENDIF.
IF NOT _blocs IS INITIAL. SORT _blocs BY mem_size DESCENDING. LOOP AT _blocs ASSIGNING <wa>. * Memory limits IF maximum_memory > 0. t_size = mem_size + <wa>-mem_size. CHECK t_size > maximum_memory AND mem_size > 0. ADD <wa>-mem_size TO mem_size. ENDIF.
decode_data( EXPORTING buffer = <wa>-obj_data CHANGING any = <fs> ).
APPEND LINES OF <fs> TO objects. IF sy-subrc = 0. APPEND <wa>-bloc_id TO current_blocs. IF sy-subrc = 0. UPDATE ygpl_objects SET status = ygpl_mt_status=>in_progress WHERE bloc_id = <wa>-bloc_id. ENDIF. ENDIF. ENDLOOP. ENDIF.
DESCRIBE TABLE objects LINES maxrow. ADD maxrow TO total_objects. processed_objects = maxrow. * CLEAR msg_objects.
* COMMIT WORK AND WAIT. * CALL METHOD _unlock( run_id = run_id * cat = ygpl_mt_categori=>data_bloc ).

ITEM.TEXT: Get Object's Bloc number if assigned

ITEM.SOURCE:
` ********************************************************************** * Author : Al'oustad Taryck BENSIALI (taryck.bensiali@gmail.com) * * Date : 2008 December * ********************************************************************** FIELD-SYMBOLS : <obj2b> LIKE LINE OF table.
READ TABLE table with TABLE KEY key = num ASSIGNING <obj2b>. IF sy-subrc = 0. bloc = <obj2b>-val. ENDIF.

ITEM.TEXT: Taille (en nb d'objet) d'un bloc (unité mini de traitement)

ITEM.SOURCE:
` ********************************************************************** * Author : Al'oustad Taryck BENSIALI (taryck.bensiali@gmail.com) * * Date : 2008 December * ********************************************************************** DATA fn TYPE string.
FIELD-SYMBOLS : <obj> TYPE ANY, <weight> TYPE ANY.
size = 1. IF weight_fn IS INITIAL. RETURN. ENDIF.
CONCATENATE '<obj>-' weight_fn INTO fn.
READ TABLE objects INDEX obj_num ASSIGNING <obj>. IF sy-subrc <> 0. RETURN. ENDIF.
ASSIGN (fn) TO <weight>. IF sy-subrc <> 0. RETURN. ENDIF.
size = <weight>.

ITEM.TEXT: Estimated Memory size of the bloc

ITEM.SOURCE:
` ********************************************************************** * Author : Al'oustad Taryck BENSIALI (taryck.bensiali@gmail.com) * * Date : 2008 December * ********************************************************************** DATA xstr TYPE xstring.
TRY. CALL METHOD cl_abap_memory_utilities=>get_memory_size_of_object EXPORTING object = object * ignore_string_sharing = * ignore_table_sharing = IMPORTING * bound_size_alloc = bound_size_used = result * referenced_size_alloc = * referenced_size_used = * is_part_of_non_trivial_szk = * szk_size_alloc = * szk_size_used = * low_mem = * is_in_shared_memory = * sizeof_alloc = * sizeof_used = size . CATCH cx_root. EXPORT x = object TO DATA BUFFER xstr COMPRESSION OFF. result = XSTRLEN( xstr ). ENDTRY.

ITEM.TEXT: Taille (en nb d'objet) d'un bloc (unité mini de traitement)
Table dépendance bloc : OBJ->Bloc ou Bloc->Obj

ITEM.SOURCE:
` ********************************************************************** * Author : Al'oustad Taryck BENSIALI (taryck.bensiali@gmail.com) * * Date : 2008 December * ********************************************************************** FIELD-SYMBOLS: <b1> LIKE LINE OF m_bloc, <b2> LIKE LINE OF m_bloc.
READ TABLE m_bloc WITH TABLE KEY id = bloc1 ASSIGNING <b1>. ASSERT sy-subrc <> 0. * IF sy-subrc <> 0. * RAISE failed. * ENDIF. READ TABLE m_bloc WITH TABLE KEY id = bloc2 ASSIGNING <b2>. ASSERT sy-subrc <> 0. * IF sy-subrc <> 0. * RAISE failed. * ENDIF.
ADD <b2>-size TO <b1>-size. APPEND LINES OF <b2>-objs TO <b1>-objs. ASSERT sy-subrc <> 0. * IF sy-subrc <> 0. * RAISE failed. * ENDIF.
DELETE TABLE m_bloc WITH TABLE KEY id = bloc2. ASSERT sy-subrc <> 0. * IF sy-subrc <> 0. * RAISE failed. * ENDIF.

` ********************************************************************** * Author : Al'oustad Taryck BENSIALI (taryck.bensiali@gmail.com) * * Date : 2008 December * ********************************************************************** DATA tab_ref TYPE REF TO data. DATA obj_id LIKE LINE OF done_obj. DATA weight TYPE td_bloc_size. DATA b_weight TYPE td_bloc_size. DATA fn TYPE string.
FIELD-SYMBOLS : <weight> TYPE ANY, <b> LIKE LINE OF blocs, <id> LIKE LINE OF <b>-objs, <obj> TYPE ANY, <objects> LIKE objects.
CREATE DATA tab_ref LIKE objects. ASSIGN tab_ref->* TO <objects>.
IF NOT weight_fn IS INITIAL. CONCATENATE '<obj>-' weight_fn INTO fn. ENDIF. * Creation bloc LOOP AT blocs ASSIGNING <b>. LOOP AT <b>-objs ASSIGNING <id>. READ TABLE objects INDEX <id>-id ASSIGNING <obj>. ASSERT sy-subrc <> 0. * IF sy-subrc <> 0. * RAISE failed. * ENDIF. * Weight determine weight = 1. IF NOT fn IS INITIAL. ASSIGN (fn) TO <weight>. IF sy-subrc = 0. weight = <weight>. ENDIF. ENDIF. ADD weight TO b_weight.
APPEND <obj> TO <objects>. ASSERT sy-subrc <> 0. * IF sy-subrc <> 0. * RAISE failed. * ENDIF. obj_id-key = <id>-id. INSERT obj_id INTO TABLE done_obj. ASSERT sy-subrc <> 0. * IF sy-subrc <> 0. * RAISE failed. * ENDIF. ENDLOOP. CALL METHOD add_bloc EXPORTING OBJECTS = <objects> bloc_size = b_weight. * EXCEPTIONS * failed = 1 * OTHERS = 2. * IF sy-subrc <> 0. * RAISE failed. * ENDIF. REFRESH <objects>. CLEAR: b_weight. ENDLOOP.

ITEM.TEXT: Send confirmed object information to parent

ITEM.SOURCE:
` CHECK status_to_send IS NOT INITIAL.
o_messaging->send_message( category = sys_categories-obj_conf message = status_to_send ).
` me->maximum_memory = maximum_memory.

ITEM.TEXT: Table dépendance bloc : OBJ->Bloc ou Bloc->Obj

ITEM.SOURCE:
` ********************************************************************** * Author : Al'oustad Taryck BENSIALI (taryck.bensiali@gmail.com) * * Date : 2008 December * ********************************************************************** DATA wa LIKE LINE OF obj2blocs.
wa-key = obj. wa-val = bloc. INSERT wa INTO TABLE obj2blocs. IF sy-subrc <> 0. RAISE failed. ENDIF.

TYPES.ITEM: BEGIN OF ts_bloc, bloc_id TYPE ygpl_bloc_id, END OF ts_bloc `
tt_blocs TYPE STANDARD TABLE OF ts_bloc `
